name: Gzip
description: Compress HTTP requests with the gzip algorithm.

GZIP_TYPES.default: application/atom+xml application/javascript application/json application/rss+xml application/vnd.ms-fontobject application/x-font-opentype application/x-font-truetype application/x-font-ttf application/x-javascript application/xhtml+xml application/xml font/eot font/opentype font/otf font/truetype image/svg+xml image/vnd.microsoft.icon image/x-icon image/x-win-bitmap text/css text/javascript text/plain text/xml
GZIP_TYPES.help: List of MIME types that will be compressed with gzip.
GZIP_TYPES.label: MIME types

GZIP_MIN_LENGTH.help: Minimum response size (in bytes) for Gzip compression to apply.
GZIP_MIN_LENGTH.label: Minimum length

GZIP_COMP_LEVEL.help: Compression level for Gzip (1 = least compression, 9 = maximum compression).
GZIP_COMP_LEVEL.label: Compression level

GZIP_PROXIED.help: Specifies which proxied requests should be compressed.
GZIP_PROXIED.label: Proxied requests
